name: Driving Blind
description:
Driving Blind

A Driving Game, Except You Can't See.

Controls
W to accelerate, S to reverse, A/D to steer, Space to brake (or left joystick and 2nd face button)

Audio buggy as hell, if it stops hold W till it talks to you again.
